about_the_game:
• Two new outfits (male and female) with three different skins each
  • New hat (male) and a new hairstyle (female)
  • New earrings (female)
  • New backpack: Spanish Guitar
  • New crops: Redcurrant and Blackcurrant
  • New tree: Blackthorn
  • New fences: Tiled Wall and Horseshow Arch
  • New road: Decorative Stream
  • New house: Spanish Farmhouse
  • New recipe: Paella
  • New house decorations: Spanish Chair, Spanish Stool, Spanish Table, Wall Lantern and Decorative Plates
  • New house walls and floor
detailed_description:
• Two new outfits (male and female) with three different skins each
  • New hat (male) and a new hairstyle (female)
  • New earrings (female)
  • New backpack: Spanish Guitar
  • New crops: Redcurrant and Blackcurrant
  • New tree: Blackthorn
  • New fences: Tiled Wall and Horseshow Arch
  • New road: Decorative Stream
  • New house: Spanish Farmhouse
  • New recipe: Paella
  • New house decorations: Spanish Chair, Spanish Stool, Spanish Table, Wall Lantern and Decorative Plates
  • New house walls and floor

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.10 or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 Graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.10 or newer
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+, tested on OSX 10.12+
  • Processor: 2.5GHz dual-core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 Graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+, tested on OSX 10.12+
  • Processor: Quad core processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Farm Together - Paella Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 capable hardware
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Quad core processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 960 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Plenty of Spanish themed content for Farm Together, such as new outfits, decorations and farm items to plant and harvest!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Russian, Norwegian, Romanian, Swedish, German, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Simplified Chinese, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish, Hungarian, Japanese, Thai, Danish, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Czech, Korean
